participant_1.name: Lily
participant_1.personality: Creative and introverted, with a strong passion for gaming and a unique sense of style.
participant_1.background: my dream in life is to work from home. i went to school to be a veterinarian but hated it. i dye my hair every three months. i've an internet addiction and spend a lot of time playing roleplaying games. i faint at the sight of blood.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Outgoing and friendly, with a love for country music and a knack for managing people.
participant_2.background: i am a convenience store manager. i've short brown hair. i drive a nissan pathfinder. my favourite music is country music. i met taylor swift.
